description: A kms key can help user to protect data security in the transmission process.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DeletionWindowInDays.description:
Duration in days after which the key is deleted
after destruction of the resource, must be between 7 and 30 days. Defaults to 30 days.

Description.description: The description of the key as viewed in Alicloud console. Default to "From Terraform".

IsEnabled.description: Specifies whether the key is enabled. Defaults to true.

KeyUsage.description: Specifies the usage of CMK. Currently, default to 'ENCRYPT/DECRYPT', indicating that CMK is used for encryption and decryption.
